snippet.title: Neyyah Gameplay - Demo | Let's Try | PC
snippet.description:
Playing and trying Neyyah game with game commentary, on PC.

Neyyah Game Information:
Neyyah is a first-person point-and-click adventure game from Defy Reality Entertainment. You are thrown into a strange secretive world called Neyyah. Use careful observation and logic to uncover the mysteries entwined within Neyyah's peculiar landscapes and bizarre cultures.

Upon waking up from a strange dream, you find yourself transported to a place called Olujay, where you meet Vamir, who sends you to Neyyah in the hope you will be safe there. For reasons you will discover upon your many explorations, Vamir needs you for a matter of great urgency.

You end up on Neyyah with only a small amount of knowledge given to you by the frantic Vamir on what you’re supposed to do when you’re there.

Things don't go as planned. In order to return to Olujay and reach Vamir, you will have to explore Neyyah – linking together the mechanical contraptions, rusted levers and blue plasma portal systems scattered throughout the bizarre landscapes, as you learn about the cultures that have shaped Neyyah.

Genre: Adventure, Indie
Developer: Defy Reality Entertainment
Publisher: MicroProse Software

More Game Information: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1289720/Neyyah/

Timestamps:
00:00 Intro
03:50 Initial Location - Olujay
07:00 Felitsu Island - Gufunkye Zone
20:34 Golorfiak Mines
24:16 The Tower
33:47 Golorfiak Mines
36:38 Felitsu Island
37:55 Outro & Review

#Neyyah #gameplay #review #letstry #gaming #games #pcgaming #pc #indie
